1.text: Squeeze a small glob of each color onto your mixing surface.

2.vid: /1/15/Make Brown from Primary Colors Step 2 Version 8.360p.mp4

3.text: Add a hint of white to give your brown more depth.
3.vid: /d/d8/Make Brown from Primary Colors Step 3 Version 8.360p.mp4

4.text: Mix together red and yellow to make orange.

5.text: Blend blue with orange to get brown.

6.text: Combine red and blue to create purple.
6.vid: /9/90/Make Brown from Primary Colors Step 6 Version 8.360p.mp4

7.text: Stir yellow into purple gradually until you end up with brown.
7.vid: /4/4c/Make Brown from Primary Colors Step 7 Version 8.360p.mp4

8.text: Mingle blue and yellow to produce green.
8.vid: /9/97/Make Brown from Primary Colors Step 8 Version 8.360p.mp4

9.text: Mix the desired amount of red with green to get brown.
9.vid: /e/e8/Make Brown from Primary Colors Step 9 Version 8.360p.mp4

10.text: Add a little extra red or yellow to give your brown a warmer tone.
10.vid: /9/94/Make Brown from Primary Colors Step 10 Version 8.360p.mp4

11.text: Increase the amount of blue you use to create a cooler finish.
11.vid: /8/8b/Make Brown from Primary Colors Step 11 Version 8.360p.mp4

12.text: Use black to darken the various browns you come up with.
12.vid: /d/d5/Make Brown from Primary Colors Step 12 Version 6.360p.mp4

13.text: Mix multiple shades of brown together.
13.vid: /a/a0/Make Brown from Primary Colors Step 13 Version 6.360p.mp4
